fool around.translation[0].definitions[0: to waste time behaving in a silly way or doing things that are not important
He always used to fool around in class.
fool around.translation[0].definitions[1: to behave in a way which is careless and not responsible
Some idiot’s been fooling around with the electricity supply!
fool around.translation[0].definitions[2: to spend time doing something that you enjoy, but that does not have a particular purpose
The boys were out in the yard, just fooling around.
fool around.translation[0].definitions[3: to have a sexual relationship with someone else’s wife, boyfriend etc
She found out that he’d been fooling around behind her back.
